name: MoPub-Flurry-Adapters
summary: Flurry Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats:  Interstitial, Rewarded Video, Native.

To download and integrate the Flurry SDK, please check this tutorial: https://developer.yahoo.com/flurry/docs/integrateflurry/ios/).


For inquiries and support, please utilize the support center: https://developer.yahoo.com/flurry/docs/faq/faqpublisher/iOS/.
